Class LinEqCons

java.lang.Object
heparansulfate.LinEqCons
public class LinEqCons extends Object
Class that represents linear equality or inequality constraints: Ax = b or Ax <= b, where A is an m by n matrix and b is an m-dimensional vector. The main utility of this class is the merging of multiple linear constraints.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    double[][]
    A
    Matrix in the linear system Ax = b.
    double[]
    b
    Constant vector in the linear system Ax = b.
    String[]
    type
    Labels for each row, identifying the type of constraint.

    Constructs a linear equality constraint: Ax = b.

    Merges an array of linear constraints into a single LinEqCons object.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static LinEqCons
    equalitiesToInequalities(LinEqCons lec)
    Transforms equality constraints Ax = b into a set of equivalent inequalities: Ax <= b and -Ax <= -b.
    String
    getStringRep()
    Returns a tab-delimited String representation of this constraint set: type \t b \t A[][0] \t A[][1] \t ... \t A[][n-1].
    static LinEqCons
    removeLastRow(LinEqCons lec)
    Removes the last row (constraint) from a LinEqCons object.

  • Method Details

    • getStringRep

      public String getStringRep()
      Returns a tab-delimited String representation of this constraint set: type \t b \t A[][0] \t A[][1] \t ... \t A[][n-1].
      Returns:
      A String representation of this LinEqCons.

    • equalitiesToInequalities

      public static LinEqCons equalitiesToInequalities(LinEqCons lec)
      Transforms equality constraints Ax = b into a set of equivalent inequalities: Ax <= b and -Ax <= -b.
      Parameters:
      lec - Set of equality constraints.
      Returns:
      Inequality version of the provided constraints.

    • removeLastRow

      public static LinEqCons removeLastRow(LinEqCons lec)
      Removes the last row (constraint) from a LinEqCons object.
      Parameters:
      lec - Original linear constraint set.
      Returns:
      A new LinEqCons object excluding the last row of the input.
